EmailTemplate.name: ES-2018-02-01-Attendee-followup.Send
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for attending our webinar on Spectre and Meltdown!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{Lead.First Name}},

Thank you for joining today’s webinar. As discussed, Turbonomic can help you get on top of Spectre/Meltdown performance issues by using automation to get the most out of your existing infrastructure.  


To show our appreciation for your attendance, we are offering a complimentary Guided Evaluation of Turbonomic.  Register below, and a technical expert will reach out shortly:



<[[https://turbonomic.com/spectre-guided-evaluation/]]>

Turbonomic provides workload automation for hybrid cloud environments.  Learn why our customers partner with us <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/#filter=.case-study]]>.


Best, The Turbonomic Team
